Purée until smooth; blend in another splash of water if mixture is too thick. Pour into glasses, filled with ice if desired.How would you rate Avocado Water?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkReviews (6)Back to TopTriangleMy go-to recipe any time I have avocados to use up before they go bad. Swapped lemon juice for lime this morning and it was just as good.AnonymousRochester, NY11/28/2020I was skeptical of the recipe, but decided to give it a go. I was not disappointed! This was a great use of avocado. It was a delicious and guilt-free indulgence. AnonymousCharlotte, NC3/24/2019This is so DELICIOUS!! I love avocados so this was perfect and easy.
